document_data.name: Kuthe
document_data.mainbody: '''Kuthe''' was one of the [[Riders of Mistledale|Riders]] in [[Mistledale]] in the [[Dalelands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, Kuthe led a patrol of the Riders. He was joined by [[Jhessail Silvertree]], one of the [[Knights of Myth Drannor]], in their effort to stop the [[Zhentilar]] armies converging on [[Shadowdale]] under the orders of [[Bane]].
